wiki.place_of_birth: Unrevealed planet in the Shi'ar Empire
wiki.powers: Manta is an [[Glossary:A#alien|alien]] possessed of the ability to summon her very life-force to generate a blinding flash of blue-white light to dazzle her opponents. Manta also sees in the infrared portion of the spectrum of light. Hence, she perceives things by the heat, or infrared radiation, that they generate.
wiki.bio_text: Manta is a member of the Imperial Guard, a multi-ethnic group of super-powered alien beings who act as enforcers of the laws of the Shi'ar Empire. She was one of eight Imperial Guardsmen chosen to battle the team of [[Glossary:S#superhuman|superhuman]] [[Earth|Earthling]] [[Glossary:M#mutant|mutants]] known as the [[X-Men]] over the fate of [[Phoenix Force|Phoenix]], a primal force of the cosmos that had assumed the form of the X-Man [[Phoenix (Jean Grey)|Jean Grey]].
wiki.bio:
Manta is a member of the Imperial Guard, a multi-ethnic group of super-powered alien beings who act as enforcers of the laws of the Shi'ar Empire. She was one of eight Imperial Guardsmen chosen to battle the team of [[Glossary:S#superhuman|superhuman]] [[Earth|Earthling]] [[Glossary:M#mutant|mutants]] known as the [[X-Men]] over the fate of [[Phoenix Force|Phoenix]], a primal force of the cosmos that had assumed the form of the X-Man [[Phoenix (Jean Grey)|Jean Grey]].


Later, after the formerly-exiled [[Deathbird]] had usurped the Shi'ar throne, Manta was amongst those Imperial Guard members who clashed with the British team of costumed adventurers known as [[Excalibur]] and the team of interstellar freebooters known as the [[Starjammers]] over the fate of the then-bearer of the [[Glossary:C#cosmic|cosmic]] Phoenix Force, the [[Glossary:A#alternate future|alternate future]] daughter of the X-Man Jean Grey named [[Marvel Girl (Rachel Summers)|Rachel Summers]].

During the war between the Shi'ar and [[Kree]] Empires, Manta was one of a small contingent of Guardsmen that were dispatched by then-Empress [[Neramani, Lilandra|Lilandra]] to retrieve the famous Nega-Bands of the Kree warrior [[Captain Marvel (Mar-Vell)|Captain Mar-vell]] from his tomb.

Manta was later one member of the insurgency team that attacked the X-Men on the orders of their Empress Lilandra, who was at the time under the mental control of [[Professor X|Charles Xavier's]] mutant twin sister [[Nova, Cassandra|Cassandra Nova]]. The attack was halted by the arrival of his fellow Guardsman [[Smasher (Vril Rokk)|Smasher]] who managed to convince the Guard of the true threat. Together, the Guard and the X-Men managed to defeat Nova and free Lilandra.
